rounds.attribution: Real photograph â€” library interior by Susan Yin (@syinq) on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: DEPTH OF FIELD: Real cameras create natural bokeh with gradual focus falloff. AI images often have abrupt transitions between sharp and blurry areas, or apply blur inconsistently across the frame.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph â€” humanoid robot by Alex Knight (@agk42) on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: REAL ROBOTS look manufactured â€” visible seams, consistent materials, machined surfaces. AI-generated robots often have impossible geometry, melting joints, or materials that shift texture mid-surface.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated landscape â€” created with Midjourney v6
rounds.pro_tip: NATURE'S CHAOS: Real landscapes have true randomness â€” no two leaves or clouds repeat. AI tends to create subtle repetitive patterns in foliage and generates unnaturally smooth water surfaces.
rounds._note: SELF-HOST: Save an AI-generated landscape image as images/d2r3_ai_abstract_landscape.jpg in your repo. Unsplash removes AI images â€” never rely on them for AI content rounds.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph â€” fresh vegetables and food styling by Anna Pelzer on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: ORGANIC CHAOS: Real food has imperfect placement, natural shadows, and varying textures. AI food images often look too perfect, with suspiciously uniform colors and unnaturally smooth surfaces.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph â€” Matrix-style code rain by Markus Spiske on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: SCREEN ARTIFACTS: Real photos of screens show moirÃ© patterns, pixel grids, and uneven brightness from the backlight. AI-generated screen images are too clean â€” perfectly uniform glow with no physical display artifacts.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph â€” colorful abstract gradient by Pawel Czerwinski on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: TEXTURE DEPTH: Real abstract photos maintain consistent texture at all zoom levels. AI-generated abstracts often break down into smudges or show banding artifacts in smooth gradients.
rounds._note: Replaces broken Round 6 image. Pawel Czerwinski is a verified prolific Unsplash contributor with 1000+ photos.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated cityscape â€” created with DALL-E 3
rounds.pro_tip: TEXT AND SIGNAGE: Look for text in the image. AI consistently mangles letters, producing gibberish on signs, storefronts, and license plates. Real photos always have legible text.
rounds._note: SELF-HOST: Save an AI-generated cityscape as images/d2r7_ai_dreamlike_cityscape.jpg. The original Unsplash AI image (Oct 2023) was purged.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph â€” laptop with purple glow by Clint Patterson (@cbpsc1) on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: REFLECTION TEST: Real reflections on glossy surfaces have natural distortion and light scatter. AI often makes reflections too perfect or places them at physically impossible angles.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated architecture â€” created with Stable Diffusion XL
rounds.pro_tip: STRUCTURAL LOGIC: Real buildings follow physics â€” load-bearing walls, consistent window grids, functional doors. AI architecture often has floating elements, impossible cantilevers, and windows that don't align with interior floors.
rounds._note: SELF-HOST: Save an AI-generated building as images/d2r9_ai_surreal_architecture.jpg. The original (Oct 2023) was purged from Unsplash.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph â€” retro gaming setup with neon lighting by Lorenzo Herrera (@lorenzoherrera) on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: LIGHTING PHYSICS: Real neon casts colored light that spills onto nearby surfaces with natural falloff. AI neon often glows in isolation â€” bright tubes that don't illuminate their surroundings realistically.
